Crack works perfectly.  No need for tunngle, just get the latest version of greenluma.  You do however, need a copy of dota 2 activated via invite or gift.  Crack with this, run greenluma and steam should run it as Serious Sam 2 HD.  

Go to grid online, custom, searh and look for games.  If you didnt find any, create a lobby and invite your steam friends to it.  Works like a charm, tested already and played full onilne matches.
@cmoyano, I would like to correct that GreenLuma is not required, but... Try it at your own risk. (By the way, why did you say it does need Dota 2, when it launches as Serious Sam 2 HD?)
Aww, I love you dude! Working perfectly!

sorry if my info is somewhat incorrect.  when it first came out and nobody was really sure tunggle people told me dota 2 invite as necessary, but if it isnt then thats fine.  I suggest u use greenluma and a fake acct if you dont want to risk getting banned.

Either way, the crack does work and works perfectly fine.
